titles.title: State and Local Candidate Fairness Act of 2001

To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that the graduated income tax rates that apply to principal campaign committees of candidates for Congress shall apply to all comparable committees of candidates for State and local offices.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 5/16/2001--Introduced. State and Local Candidate Fairness Act of 2001 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that the graduated income tax rates applicable to principal campaign committees of candidates for Congress shall also apply to all comparable committees of candidates for State and local offices.
